resources.string: SplitMe helps users to split the bill among your friends with or without taxes accurately. By entering every amount a person spent before adding the tax, you can get how much a person should pay by hitting the split button.
Split & Divide behaves like SplitMe but with some items to be divided equally and added into each person\' spending.
You may change the Service tax % and assign a discount value(if there is any) with the buttons on the toolbar. The service tax and gst can be unchecked if there are not any.
DivideMe divides the amount equally to the numbers of people assigned.
You can use the plus button to add another item for a person!
SplitMe was created to make splitting bills easier. It helps users to split their restaurant bills easily
